# Self Replicator Command

Clone the agent to new environments with all learned skills and curated memory..

## Usage

```
/self-replicator
```

## What It Does

This command invokes the `self-replicator` skill. See the skill documentation for detailed process steps.

## Skill Reference

This command invokes: `@skills/self-replicator`

See `@skills/self-replicator/SKILL.md` for full documentation and `@skills/self-replicator/reference.md` for examples.
